cz.syntea.xdef.sys

Class SReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.sys.SPosition
      • cz.syntea.xdef.sys.SReporter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StringParser

    public class SReporter
extends SPosition
    Reporting with source position.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new instance of SReporter.

      Creates a new instance of SReporter with reporter and given parameters.
      SReporter(SReporter reporter)
      Creates a new instance of SReporter with reporter and given parameters taken from another report generator.

      • SReporter

        public SReporter()
        Creates a new instance of SReporter. Connected reporter will be ArrayReporter.

        public SReporter(ReportWriter reportWriter)
        Creates a new instance of SReporter.
        Parameters:
        reportWriter - Report writer connected to report generator.

      • SReporter

        public SReporter(SReporter reporter)
        Creates a new instance of SReporter with reporter and given parameters taken from another report generator.
        Parameters:
        reporter - The reporter.

      • SReporter

        public SReporter(ReportWriter reportWriter,
                 SPosition position)
        Creates a new instance of SReporter with reporter and given parameters.
        Parameters:
        reportWriter - Report Writer.
        position - The source position.

      • getReportWriter

        public final ReportWriter getReportWriter()
        Get report writer.
        Returns:
        Report writer associated with this reporter or null.

        public final void setReportWriter(ReportWriter reportWriter)
        Set report writer.
        Parameters:
        reportWriter - SReporter to be associated with this generator.

      • putReport

        public void putReport(Report report)
        Put report. Type of report may be WARNING, ERROR or FATAL (see Report.getMsgID()).
        Parameters:
        report - The report.
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if reporter is null and if report type is FATAL, ERROR or LIGHTERROR .

      • putReport

        public void putReport(SPosition pos,
                      Report report)
        Put report at position.
        Parameters:
        pos - Source position.
        report - The report.
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if reporter is null and if report type is FATAL, ERROR or LIGHTERROR .

      • getErrorCount

        public int getErrorCount()
        Get number of errors.
        Returns:
        Number of errors.

      • getWarningCount

        public int getWarningCount()
        Get number of warnings.
        Returns:
        Number of warnings.

      • errors

        public boolean errors()
        Return true if and only if errors or fatal errors or light errors were generated.
        Returns:
        true if an error occurred.

      • errorWarnings

        public boolean errorWarnings()
        Check if errors, light errors or warnings were generated.
        Returns:
        true if errors or warnings occurred.

      • checkAndThrowErrors

        public void checkAndThrowErrors()
                         throws SRuntimeException
        Check error reports in the reporter. Return normally if no error was reported, otherwise throws the exception with the list of error messages (max. MAX_REPORTS messages).
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if an error was reported.

      • checkAndThrowErrorWarnings

        public void checkAndThrowErrorWarnings()
                                throws SRuntimeException
        Check error or warning reports in the reporter. Return normally if no error or warning was reported, otherwise throws the exception with the list of error messages (max. MAX_REPORTS messages).
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if an error or warning was reported.

      • printReports

        public void printReports(java.io.PrintStream out)
        Write reports to output stream. Please use getReportReader().printReports(...).
        Parameters:
        out - The output stream.

      • printToString

        public java.lang.String printToString()
        Write reports to String.
        Returns:
        the String with reports.
